TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed TaskStatus extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Represents the current stage in the lifecycle of a .

remarks.format:
## Remarks The <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task.Status%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property returns a member of the TaskStatus enumeration to indicate the task's current status.
## Examples The following example creates 20 tasks that will loop until a counter is incremented to a value of 2 million. When the first 10 tasks reach 2 million, the cancellation token is cancelled, and any tasks whose counters have not reached 2 million are cancelled. The example then examines the <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task.Status%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property of each task to indicate whether the task has completed successfully or been cancelled. For those that have completed, it displays the value returned by the task.
[!code-cs[System.Threading.Tasks.Task.Run#7](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/t-system.threading.tasks_2_1.cs)] [!code-vb[System.Threading.Tasks.Task.Run#7](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/t-system.threading.tasks_2_1.vb)]

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Threading.Tasks.TaskStatus Canceled = int32(6)

Docs.summary: The task acknowledged cancellation by throwing an OperationCanceledException with its own CancellationToken while the token was in signaled state, or the task's CancellationToken was already signaled before the task started executing. For more information, see [Task Cancellation](../Topic/Task%20Cancellation.md).

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Threading.Tasks.TaskStatus Created = int32(0)

Docs.summary: The task has been initialized but has not yet been scheduled.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Threading.Tasks.TaskStatus Faulted = int32(7)

Docs.summary: The task completed due to an unhandled exception.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Threading.Tasks.TaskStatus RanToCompletion = int32(5)
.field public static literal valuetype System.Threading.Tasks.TaskStatus Running = int32(3)

Docs.summary: The task is running but has not yet completed.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Threading.Tasks.TaskStatus WaitingForActivation = int32(1)

Docs.summary: The task is waiting to be activated and scheduled internally by the .NET Framework infrastructure.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Threading.Tasks.TaskStatus WaitingForChildrenToComplete = int32(4)

Docs.summary: The task has finished executing and is implicitly waiting for attached child tasks to complete.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Threading.Tasks.TaskStatus WaitingToRun = int32(2)

Docs.summary: The task has been scheduled for execution but has not yet begun executing.
